confirm_model.title: Confirm your model
confirm_model.description: Please check that your device is a Nothing Phone 1 (Spacewar).

downgrade_android.title: Downgrade Android
downgrade_android.description: Stock Android 13 is required to install Ubuntu Touch. This device has a rollback protection that needs to be disabled first in order to downgrade. Click on More... for the downgrade process.

confirm_os.title: Confirm OS version
confirm_os.description: Your device must be running NothingOS version of Android 13 (NothingOS 2.0.5) before installing Ubuntu Touch. Any other type of ROM (stock or custom) won't work! Click below on More... to download NOS 2.0.5 and follow the steps on the downgrade section.

unlock_phone.title: Unlock the bootloader
unlock_phone.description: Before installing Ubuntu Touch, the bootloader must be unlocked first. Follow the steps in the linked page if you haven't already.

bootloader.title: Reboot to Bootloader
bootloader.description: With the device powered off, press and hold the VOLUME DOWN button and plug the device into your PC via USB. After some seconds you'll see the fastboot mode.

bootloader_from_fastbootd.title: Reboot to Bootloader
bootloader_from_fastbootd.description: With the device still at the fastbootd screen, use the volume buttons to select "Reboot to bootloader".

recovery.title: Reboot to Recovery
recovery.description: With the device still at the "FastBoot Mode", use the Volume buttons to switch to "Recovery Mode" and push the power button to confirm your selection.

fastbootd.title: Reboot to fastbootd mode
fastbootd.description: With the device still at the "FastBoot Mode", use the Volume buttons to switch to "Recovery Mode" and push the power button to confirm your selection. Then select "Fastboot mode" from the list.

options.name: Wipe Userdata
options.tooltip: Wipe personal data. This is necessary for first time installations.

options.name: Partitioning
options.tooltip: Changes partition sizes as required. Only necessary for first time installations.
